short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Love Island Content from current web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes Love Island Content from current web page

I'm not sure what more Google want as a description because this does what it says on the tin - it removes (most) Love Island content from the web page you currently have active.

I have more to do, but at the moment this extension replaces most (but not all) images relating to "Love Island".
